a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Death rate from cardiovascular diseases by sex, 2022
Reported annual death rate from cardiovascular diseases per 100,000 people, based on the underlying cause
Death rate in women (deaths per 100,000 people)
Death rate in men (deaths per 100,000 people)
Note: To allow for comparisons between countries and over time, this metric is age-standardized. All deaths in a country may not have been
registered with a cause of death.
